text:
The 5 stages of reacting to a peer review comment:

1. That’s so dumb, they should be stripped of their doctorate
2. I can see where they’re coming from, but still dumb
3. This doesn’t *harm* the paper 
4. The paper is stronger 
5. I will now use this approach in all my papers
name: Dan Quintana
